RT Tickets Resolved/Code Changes For ZMap 0.1.112

Last Release Date: 18/02/2011

Current Release Date: 21 February 2011

This report covers 2011-02-18 to 2011-02-21

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved


Code Changes From CVS/GIT Repositories


ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: add strand swopping macro.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtilsUsers.c: add extra pattern for local domains for checking developer user.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDNA.c, zmapWindowDNAChoose.c: fix up coord stuff for when revcomp'd.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowState.c: add strand to item save otherwise can't find it again correctly, fix bug in mark restore.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowUtils.c: add new coord pair swopping func, saves a lot of work by caller.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindow.c: update overall sequence coords for revcomp.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWindow.h: add prototypes for new coord transform func + mark printing func.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeatureShow.c: fix so that if remote program does not return exons then we still show them.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: various coord printing funcs moved to zmapWindowItemDebug.c.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemDebug.c: some funcs moved from zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c and code added to print out item groups.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix bug in transcript width, wrong place for it to be adjusted here.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h: add default busy cursor, prototype for zmapWindowCoordPairToDisplay.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: add calls to zmapWindowCoordPairToDisplay, move some debug funcs to zmapWindowItemDebug.c
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark.c: fix bug in finding block for mark, fix bugs in position, size and restore of mark.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: try to fix sizes of groups which were mostly wrong...still some work to do here.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem_I.h: add some commenting to struct.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem.c: completely redo background sizing code, was all wrong.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerBlock.c: just commenting stuff.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerGroup.c: fix bug in background size.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerGroup.c: remove debug output.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark_P.h: fix missing func prototype change.
  • src/: zmapControl/zmapControlWindow.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowMenus.c: remove unused var.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColConfig.c: def out unused func.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: add missing header, remove unused vars.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem.c: remove unused vars.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2011_02_18.shtml
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.14584/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindow.c: patch to gtk widget call for old libs on CBI4

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS

Seqtools Changes/Fixes [from git]
  • Browse CVS
  • Fixed a bug with populating optional data for protein variants
  • Also fixed an issue where the column sizes were not being refreshed when optional data was loaded from the Settings dialog.
  • Incremented version to 4.1.10
